TopicTitle: The plugin that sorts your rocket parts via mod?

Articles.Content: I can't find this but I know a lot of people use it. Also I'm curious about the mod. If I have mods that are not catalogued by the sorting mod thingie, does it mess it up? Will the parts not show up? Or do they just show up as stock or as "other"? Thanks!

I think you're talking about PartCatalog: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35018-0-21-PartCatalog-2-0-Big-overhaul-get-your-dynamic-subgroups-now!

To answer your question: If you click the "All" button in the UI or un-highlight all the mod buttons, it'll show you what the pages would look like without the mod and will display all the parts. I use this mod and I love it.

I think you're talking about PartCatalog: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35018-0-21-PartCatalog-2-0-Big-overhaul-get-your-dynamic-subgroups-now!

To answer your question: If you click the "All" button in the UI or un-highlight all the mod buttons, it'll show you what the pages would look like without the mod and will display all the parts. I use this mod and I love it.

Ahhh thank you!
